name: Calculate Hours for Configure XLS Panel
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA XLS Panel Configuration:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>*4)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>*0.17)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>*0.75)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Standard Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Monitor Module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Control module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Isolation modules)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of pull stations)*>)*0.17)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of horns)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of strobes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of combination units)*>)*0.25)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Specialty Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of 4-20mA monitor module points)*>)*0.5)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>*4)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>*0.17)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>*0.75)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Standard Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Monitor Module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Control module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Isolation modules)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of pull stations)*>)*0.17)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of horns)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of strobes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of combination units)*>)*0.25)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Specialty Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of 4-20mA monitor module points)*>)*0.5))*1) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval(((<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>*4)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>*0.17)+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>*0.75)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Standard Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Monitor Module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Control module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Isolation modules)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of pull stations)*>)*0.17)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of horns)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of strobes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of combination units)*>)*0.25)+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Specialty Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of 4-20mA monitor module points)*>)*0.5))*1) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
